apiVersion.description: The api version of this cardanopy config

network.description: The network for the Cardano node

configPath.description: The config path for the Cardano node

topologyPath.description: The topology config path for the Cardano node

databasePath.description: The database path for the Cardano node

socketPath.description: The socket path for the Cardano node

hostAddr.description: The host address for the Cardano node

port.description: The port for the Cardano node

shelleyKesKey.description: The shelley KES key used for the Cardano node. (block producer only)

shelleyVrfKey.description: The shelley VRF key used for the Cardano node. (block producer only)

shelleyOperationalCertificate.description: The shelley operational cert used for the Cardano node. (block producer only)

name.description: The unique docker container name for the Cardano node

image.description: The docker image that will be mounted into the node. Only used with `cardanopy docker` command.

rootVolume.description: The docker volume that will be mounted into the node. Only used with `cardanopy docker` command.

namespace.description: The kubernetes namespace. Only used with `cardanopy k8s` command.
